verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* when the \w sabbath|strong="G4521"\w* was \w past|strong="G1230"\w*, \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w Magdalene|strong="G3094"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \add mother\add* of \w James|strong="G2385"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Salome|strong="G4539"\w*, had \w bought|strong="G0059"\w* sweet \w spices|strong="G0759"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they might \w come|strong="G2064"\w* and \w anoint|strong="G0218"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w very|strong="G3029"\w* early in the \w morning|strong="G4404"\w* the \w first|strong="G1520"\w* \add day\add* of the \w week|strong="G4521"\w*, they \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G1909"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w* at the \w rising|strong="G0393"\w* of the \w sun|strong="G2246"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w among|strong="G4314"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* shall \w roll|strong="G0617"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w away|strong="G0617"\w* the \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w door|strong="G2374"\w* of the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they \w looked|strong="G0308"\w*, they \w saw|strong="G2334"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w stone|strong="G3037"\w* was rolled \w away|strong="G0617"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w very|strong="G4970"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w entering|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*, they \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* a young \w man|strong="G3495"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the right \w side|strong="G1188"\w*, \w clothed|strong="G4016"\w* in a \w long|strong="G4749"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w garment|strong="G4749"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they were \w affrighted|strong="G1568"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Be|strong="G1568"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w affrighted|strong="G1568"\w*: Ye \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* of \w Nazareth|strong="G3479"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* was \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*: he is \w risen|strong="G1453"\w*; he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w here|strong="G5602"\w*: \w behold|strong="G1492"\w* the \w place|strong="G5117"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* they \w laid|strong="G5087"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* go your \w way|strong="G5217"\w*, \w tell|strong="G2036"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he goeth \w before|strong="G4254"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Galilee|strong="G1056"\w*: \w there|strong="G1563"\w* shall ye \w see|strong="G3700"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they went \w out|strong="G1831"\w* \w quickly|strong="G5035"\w*, and \w fled|strong="G5343"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w sepulchre|strong="G3419"\w*; \w for|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w trembled|strong="G5156"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were \w amazed|strong="G1611"\w*: \w neither|strong="G2532"\w* said \w they|strong="G2036"\w* any \w thing|strong="G3762"\w* to \w any|strong="G3762"\w* \add man\add*; \w for|strong="G1063"\w* they were \w afraid|strong="G5399"\w*.

¶ Now \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \add Jesus\add* was \w risen|strong="G0450"\w* \w early|strong="G4404"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \add day\add* of the \w week|strong="G4521"\w*, he \w appeared|strong="G5316"\w* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* to \w Mary|strong="G3137"\w* \w Magdalene|strong="G3094"\w*, out \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* he had \w cast|strong="G1544"\w* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w devils|strong="G1140"\w*.

\add And\add* she \w went|strong="G4198"\w* and \w told|strong="G0518"\w* them \w that|strong="G1565"\w* had \w been|strong="G1096"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, as they \w mourned|strong="G3996"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wept|strong="G2799"\w*.

And \w they|strong="G2548"\w*, when they had \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he was \w alive|strong="G2198"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* had been \w seen|strong="G2300"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w her|strong="G0846"\w*, believed \w not|strong="G0569"\w*.

¶ \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w that|strong="G5023"\w* he \w appeared|strong="G5319"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w another|strong="G2087"\w* \w form|strong="G3444"\w* unto \w two|strong="G1417"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, as they \w walked|strong="G4043"\w*, and \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w country|strong="G0068"\w*.

And \w they|strong="G2548"\w* \w went|strong="G0565"\w* and \w told|strong="G0518"\w* \add it\add* unto the \w residue|strong="G3062"\w*: \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* believed \w they|strong="G4100"\w* \w them|strong="G1565"\w*.

¶ \w Afterward|strong="G5305"\w* he \w appeared|strong="G5319"\w* unto the \w eleven|strong="G1733"\w* as \w they|strong="G0846"\w* sat at \w meat|strong="G0345"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upbraided|strong="G3679"\w* them with \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w unbelief|strong="G0570"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hardness of \w heart|strong="G4641"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* they \w believed|strong="G4100"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* them \w which|strong="G3588"\w* had \w seen|strong="G2300"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* after he was \w risen|strong="G1453"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Go ye|strong="G4198"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w all|strong="G0537"\+w* \+w the world|strong="G2889"\+w*, \+w and preach|strong="G2784"\+w* \+w the gospel|strong="G2098"\+w* \+w to every|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w creature|strong="G2937"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w He|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w that believeth|strong="G4100"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w is baptized|strong="G0907"\+w* \+w shall be saved|strong="G4982"\+w*; \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w that believeth not|strong="G0569"\+w* \+w shall be damned|strong="G2632"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w these|strong="G5023"\+w* \+w signs|strong="G4592"\+w* \+w shall follow|strong="G3877"\+w* \+w them|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w that believe|strong="G4100"\+w*; \+w In|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w my|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w name|strong="G3686"\+w* \+w shall they cast out|strong="G1544"\+w* \+w devils|strong="G1140"\+w*; \+w they shall speak|strong="G2980"\+w* \+w with new|strong="G2537"\+w* \+w tongues|strong="G1100"\+w*;\wj*

\wj  \+w They shall take up|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w serpents|strong="G3789"\+w*; \+w and if|strong="G2579"\+w* \+w they drink|strong="G4095"\+w* \+w any|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w deadly thing|strong="G2286"\+w*, \+w it shall|strong="G0984"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w hurt|strong="G0984"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*; \+w they shall lay|strong="G2007"\+w* \+w hands|strong="G5495"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the sick|strong="G0732"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they shall|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w recover|strong="G2573"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w So|strong="G3767"\w* \w then|strong="G3303"\w* \w after|strong="G3326"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* had \w spoken|strong="G2980"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, he was received \w up|strong="G0353"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sat|strong="G2523"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w they|strong="G1565"\w* went \w forth|strong="G1831"\w*, and \w preached|strong="G2784"\w* every \w where|strong="G3837"\w*, the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* working \w with|strong="G4903"\w* \add them\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w confirming|strong="G0950"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w with|strong="G1223"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* \w following|strong="G1872"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.
